column4: What code editors are available? I used to use Notepad++ on windows. Anything similar?
gedit would the closest to notepad++ that I can think of.  There is also the gedit-plugins package if you want more plugins.
Is there an autocad replacement for linux?
I found sagcad in the ubuntu installer (9.10) should I check some other repo?
How do I search for files like in Windows? oO
Just how to find a file :)
I want all the *.ttf files in a folder
Ctrl F or F3 not working
Find then copy to another folder
There is a gui method, I just don't know what it is.
